sentences.sContent: When Jack was born he had a fuzz of black hair on his head.
sentences.sCn: 杰克出生的时候长着一头细细的黑发。

synos.tran: 作绒毛状飞散；变成绒毛状；变得模糊

words.tran: 模糊的；失真的；有绒毛的

trans.tranOther: thin soft hair or a substance like hair that covers something

trans.tranCn: 作绒毛状飞散；变成绒毛状；变得模糊
trans.tranOther: to make or become indistinct; blur
to make or become indistinct; blur
